svg.title: Testing that dynamic changes to the element for a given ID are reflected in marker
svg.script: function startTest() { document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); setTimeout(doTest, 4000); // fallback for running outside reftest } function doTest() { // check that changing an id to "m1" lets l1 find it var x = document.getElementById("x"); x.setAttribute("id", "m1"); document.documentElement.removeAttribute('class'); }
